articles.title: Watch: Elon Musk's SpaceX Starship Lands, Then Explodes - NDTV
articles.description: Space Exploration Technologies Corp.'s newest and biggest rocket pulled off its first successful landing, then exploded a brief time later and was engulfed by fire.
articles.content:
Despite the mishap, the test is likely to signal progress for the massive vehicle.
